post_body: What's Happening In Birmingham This Week? December 16, 2024

comment.body:

Data last scraped 12/16/2024, 11:38:50 AM, taking 27.7 seconds. Currently tracking 17 calendars. If I'm broken, ping /u/NotFlameRetardant and tell him he's a bad bot dad.
